short.ar: إذا كنت تحب ألعاب السيارات ، فإن لعبة شاحنة القمامة هذه تناسبك.
short.am: የመኪና ጨዋታዎችን የምትወዱት ከሆነ ይህ የቆሻሻ መኪና ጨዋታ ለእርስዎ ነው.
short.bg: Ако ви харесва игри с коли, тази игра боклукчийски камион е за вас.
short.bn: আপনি যদি গাড়ী গেম পছন্দ করেন তবে এই আবর্জনা ট্রাক গেমটি আপনার জন্য।
short.ca: Si t'agraden els jocs de cotxes, aquest joc de camions d'escombraries és per a tu.
short.cs: Pokud máte rádi automobilové hry, tato hra s popelářským vozem je pro vás.
short.da: Hvis du kan lide bilspil, er dette skraldebilspil noget for dig.
short.de: Wenn du Autospiele magst, ist dieses Müllwagenspiel genau das Richtige für dich.
short.el: Αν σας αρέσουν τα παιχνίδια αυτοκινήτων, αυτό το παιχνίδι απορριμματοφόρων είναι για εσάς.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: If you like car games, this garbage truck game is for you.
short.es: Si te gustan los juegos de coches, este juego de camiones de basura es para ti.
short.et: Kui teile meeldivad automängud, on see prügiautode mäng teie jaoks.
short.fa: اگر دوست دارید بازی ماشین، این بازی کامیون زباله برای شما است.
short.fi: Jos pidät autopeleistä, tämä roska-autopeli on sinua varten.
short.fil: Kung gusto mo ng mga laro ng kotse, ang laro ng trak ng basura na ito ay para sa iyo.
short.fr: Si vous aimez les jeux de voiture, ce jeu de camion poubelle est fait pour vous.
short.gu: જો તમને કાર ગેમ્સ ગમતી હોય, તો આ કચરાની ટ્રક ગેમ તમારા માટે છે.
short.he: אם אתה אוהב משחקי מכוניות, משחק משאית האשפה הזה הוא בשבילך.
short.hi: यदि आप कार गेम पसंद करते हैं, तो यह कचरा ट्रक गेम आपके लिए है।
short.hr: Ako volite automobilske igre, ova igra kamiona za smeće je za vas.
short.hu: Ha szereted az autós játékokat, ez a kukásautó játék neked szól.
short.id: Jika Anda menyukai game mobil, game truk sampah ini cocok untuk Anda.
short.it: Se ti piacciono i giochi di auto, questo gioco di camion della spazzatura è per te.
short.ja: あなたが車のゲームが好きなら、このごみ収集車ゲームはあなたのためです。
short.kn: ನೀವು ಕಾರು ಆಟಗಳನ್ನು ಇಷ್ಟಪಟ್ಟರೆ, ಈ ಕಸದ ಟ್ರಕ್ ಆಟ ನಿಮಗಾಗಿ.
short.ko: 자동차 게임을 좋아한다면 이 쓰레기 트럭 게임이 적합합니다.
short.lv: Ja jums patīk automašīnu spēles, šī atkritumu kravas automašīnu spēle ir paredzēta jums.
short.ml: നിങ്ങൾക്ക് കാർ ഗെയിമുകൾ ഇഷ്ടമാണെങ്കിൽ, ഈ മാലിന്യ ട്രക്ക് ഗെയിം നിങ്ങൾക്കുള്ളതാണ്.
short.mr: जर तुम्हाला कार गेम्स आवडत असतील तर हा कचरा ट्रक गेम तुमच्यासाठी आहे.
short.ms: Jika anda suka permainan kereta, permainan trak sampah ini adalah untuk anda.
short.nl: Als je van autospellen houdt, is dit vuilniswagenspel iets voor jou.
short.no: Hvis du liker bilspill, er dette søppelbilspillet for deg.
short.pl: Jeśli lubisz gry samochodowe, ta gra śmieciarki jest dla Ciebie.
short.ro: Dacă vă plac jocurile cu mașini, acest joc cu camioane de gunoi este pentru dvs.
short.ru: Если вам нравятся автомобильные игры, эта игра про мусоровозы для вас.
short.sk: Ak máte radi hry s autami, táto hra so smetiarskym autom je pre vás.
short.sl: Če imate radi avtomobilske igre, je ta igra s smetarskimi tovornjaki za vas.
short.sv: Om du gillar bilspel är det här sopbilsspelet något för dig.
short.sw: Ikiwa unapenda michezo ya gari, mchezo huu wa lori la takataka ni kwako.
short.ta: நீங்கள் கார் விளையாட்டுகளை விரும்பினால், இந்த குப்பை லாரி விளையாட்டு உங்களுக்கானது.
short.te: మీకు కార్ గేమ్స్ ఇష్టమైతే, ఈ గార్బేజ్ ట్రక్ గేమ్ మీకోసమే.
short.th: ถ้าคุณชอบเกมรถเกมรถบรรทุกขยะนี้เหมาะสําหรับคุณ
short.tr: Araba oyunlarını seviyorsanız, bu çöp kamyonu oyunu tam size göre.
short.uk: Якщо вам подобаються автомобільні ігри, ця гра про сміттєвоз для вас.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a world where realistic 3D graphics and detailed design meet, experience the most realistic and impressive experience of the truck simulator with Garbage Truck Driving. This game allows you to get behind the wheel of the garbage truck, and you create a clean environment by collecting garbage cans in the city.

The game's main purpose is meaningful and has an environmentally friendly goal. You must collect the garbage cans in the city and move them to the garbage can within the desired time. You can earn rewards by completing tasks on time. Thanks to these awards, you can customize your truck. You can personalize your truck by changing the color of the truck, camber, and other details.

The game includes elements such as fuel and repair systems to increase realism further. If you run out of fuel, you can waste time on missions. That's why it's important not to forget to refuel before starting missions. At the same time, your truck may be involved in accidents during missions. In this case, you can have your truck repaired at the repair station and continue.

Among the car games, this game offers a unique experience for truck driving enthusiasts. As a garbage truck simulator, it offers a fun game experience and raises awareness of environmental cleaning. Feel the importance of creating a clean environment in this game, get behind the wheel of the garbage truck, and get rewards by cleaning the city.

How To Play
You can use WASD or arrow keys to move the garbage truck. While using the C key to switch between the cameras, you have to use the F key to activate the nitro in your truck.

Garbage Truck Driving Car Game Features
✓ Realistic sounds
✓ 3D Graphics
✓ Realistic Environment
✓ Easy control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Garbage Truck Driving Car Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
